name: Instagram Post Kit
description:
This kit is designed for the formatting of your images and pre-visualization of your grid. You will find that the kit is broken out into 3 pages:

  1. Welcome
  2. Components
  3. Image Formatting – profile, single grid and story posts, and slider story posts
  4. Grid visualization – place images in your grid and see how it will look in your feed with a high fidelity prototype


A guide can be found here.


If you have any feedback, requested improvements, or changes you would like to see in this kit please add it here.
